name: Freewaters Freeland Travel Slip On Shoes - Women's
description:
Seakers that feel like sandals. The upper is breathable and adjust with sandal-like strap to deliver incredible comfort and support.Knit upper hugs you foot like a sock.Supreem Foam midsole offers long-lasting comfort and rebound.Foam contains 10-15% recycled materials.Rrubber tread.Dyed with e.dye® Waterless Colour System™ that uses 75% less water, fewer chemicals and emits less CO2 than traditional methods.Responsibly sourced leather from tanneries where 100% of the water used is naturally filtered by onsite wetlands.PVC-free construction uses water-based adhesives instead of solvents.Every pair of Freewaters sold helps support global clean water initiatives.

        Sustainability
